page.title: 08LLANDYSUL CARNIVAL WEEK
page.content: This is held during the first week of {July}each year. The Committee set up early in the year arranges events. A{ {Carnival Queen} and attendants are chosen at a disco. The money obtained during the week by collections, or paying to watch or enter the events, goes to various charities or local organisations. These events include,a Treasure Hunt, Fancy Dress Dance, Barbecue, Darts and Snooker Competitions, Knockout Foolball etc. The {Carnival Procession} is on the Saturday. The Queen's float goes from Pontweli, through the village, to the park. Here the competitors are judged and{Children's Sports}are organised. There are various stalls and competitions in the park and people can buy teas, cakes etc. When the weather is fine an enjoyable time is had by all.
